content.html: When I did 4 months of looking for a new job last year I did a lot of code tests. All it did was piss me off how arbitrary some of them were. They told me more about the company I'd be joining though, which helped me realise a lot of companies still don't know how to hire.
content.value:
When I did 4 months of looking for a new job last year I did a lot of code tests. All it did was piss me off how arbitrary some of them were.

They told me more about the company I'd be joining though, which helped me realise a lot of companies still don't know how to hire.
